subtasks.name: Review AI Regulation Requirements
subtasks.description: Understand and summarize the key components of the RAISE act, focusing on transparency requirements and employee rights.
subtasks.notes: This is critical for compliance and may require consultation with pro bono legal team.

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Framework
subtasks.description: Create a framework that outlines how the organization will comply with the requirements of the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Requires a clear understanding of both legal and technical aspects.

subtasks.name: Implement Training Programs
subtasks.description: Design and implement training programs for employees regarding the use of AI and compliance with the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Training must be updated regularly based on evolving AI technologies and regulations.

subtasks.name: Establish Monitoring Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Set up processes to monitor compliance with the RAISE act and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs.
subtasks.notes: Monitoring tools may require technical expertise to implement.

subtasks.name: Document Compliance Efforts
subtasks.description: Maintain thorough documentation of compliance efforts, including training materials and monitoring results.
subtasks.notes: Documentation is essential for demonstrating compliance.

key_risks: Limited understanding of AI technologies may hinder compliance efforts.
Dependence on pro bono legal support may result in delays.

subtasks.name: Understand AI regulations
subtasks.description: Review and comprehend the RAISE act and its implications for the nonprofit's operations.
subtasks.notes: May need legal assistance to fully understand compliance requirements.

subtasks.name: Develop transparency protocols
subtasks.description: Create protocols to ensure compliance with transparency requirements regarding AI model training and use.
subtasks.notes: Technical expertise needed to align protocols with AI practices.

subtasks.name: Employee training on AI compliance
subtasks.description: Train employees on the new compliance requirements and their rights and obligations under the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Training materials may need to be developed with legal input.

subtasks.name: Establish reporting mechanisms
subtasks.description: Set up internal reporting mechanisms for violations and compliance issues related to AI.
subtasks.notes: Ensure that the reporting process is user-friendly for employees.

subtasks.name: Regular audits and compliance checks
subtasks.description: Conduct regular audits to ensure ongoing compliance with the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Audits may require external legal expertise for thoroughness.

key_risks: Inability to fully understand and implement compliance due to low legal resources.
Potential violations due to lack of employee awareness and training.

subtasks.name: Familiarize with RAISE Act requirements
subtasks.description: Review and understand the requirements of the RAISE Act, including definitions and obligations.
subtasks.notes: Limited legal expertise may hinder full understanding.

subtasks.name: Assess current AI practices
subtasks.description: Evaluate the organization's current use of AI technologies against the RAISE Act requirements.
subtasks.notes: Technical expertise is crucial to accurately assess AI practices.

subtasks.name: Develop compliance plan
subtasks.description: Create a detailed plan outlining how the organization will meet the RAISE Act requirements.
subtasks.notes: Legal advice may be needed for compliance specifics.

subtasks.name: Implement training programs
subtasks.description: Develop and conduct training for staff on the new compliance measures related to AI.
subtasks.notes: Training may need to be updated annually.

subtasks.name: Monitor compliance
subtasks.description: Establish a process for ongoing monitoring of compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Regular assessments will be necessary to maintain compliance.

key_risks: Lack of legal expertise may lead to non-compliance.
Insufficient training may result in improper use of AI technologies.

subtasks.name: Monitor Compliance and Reporting
subtasks.description: Regularly monitor compliance with the AI regulations and prepare necessary reports.
